meanings.sent1: She unchairs her cat gently when it jumps on the forbidden armchair.
meanings.sent2: Please unchairs the guests before the meeting starts.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy unchairs the unsuspecting toddler during playtime.
meanings.sent4: The magician unchairs the volunteer without any visible movement.
meanings.sent5: He unchairs himself gracefully, avoiding any embarrassing moments.

meanings.definition: To cause to fall from a chair.
meanings.sent1: The strong wind unchairs the umbrella from the patio table.
meanings.sent2: Be careful not to unchairs yourself while leaning back too far.
meanings.sent3: The prankster tries to unchairs his friend during the game of musical chairs.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected news unchairs her, leaving her stunned.
meanings.sent5: The sudden laughter unchairs him, making everyone chuckle.
